title: Smart Data Models mapping of RPaM ontology data model Criterion property
description: A condition that needs to be answered for evaluation purposes.

id.description: Property. Unique Id of the entity

type.description: Property. It has to be CriterionProperty

ID.description: Property. An identifier to refer to the criterion property

Name.description: Property. The name of the criterion property

Description.description: Property. A description of the criterion property

items.description: Property. Every element of the description

TypeCode.description: Property. A mutually agreed code signifying the type of the property

InformationRequirementCriterionPropertyD.description: Property. Specific information needed to measure a criterion

items.description: Property. Every element of the information needed to measure a criterion

ConstraintCriterionPropertyDatum.description: Property. The value provided for a criterion property

items.description: Property. Every element of the value provided for a criterion property

MinimumConstraintCriterionPropertyDatum.description: Property. The minimum value provided for a criterion property.

items.description: Property. Every element of the minimum value provided for a criterion property

MaximumConstraintCriterionPropertyDatum.description: Property. The maximum value provided for a criterion property.

items.description: Property. Every element of the maximum value provided for a criterion property
